Package AnimeDatabase

Class AnimeDatabase

java.lang.Object
AnimeDatabase.AnimeDatabase
public class AnimeDatabase extends Object
Author: Josue Suazo Course: Software Development I CEN-3024C Date: 6/12/2024 (Update 1 6/19/2024) (GUI Update 7/1/2024) (SQLite update 7/10/2024) (Jar update 7/14/2024) AnimeDatabase.java This class provides the database management for the Anime Database Management System.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect(String dbPath)
      Connects to the SQLite database with the provided path.
      Parameters:
      dbPath - the path to the SQLite database file

    • addAnime

      public boolean addAnime(Anime anime)
      Adds an anime to the database.
      Parameters:
      anime - the Anime object to add
      Returns:
      true if the anime was added successfully, false otherwise

    • removeAnime

      public boolean removeAnime(String title)
      Removes an anime from the database by title.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the anime to remove
      Returns:
      true if the anime was removed successfully, false otherwise

    • removeAnimeByStudio

      public boolean removeAnimeByStudio(String studio)
      Removes an anime from the database by studio.
      Parameters:
      studio - the studio of the anime to remove
      Returns:
      true if the anime was removed successfully, false otherwise

    • updateAnime

      public boolean updateAnime(String title, Anime updatedAnime)
      Updates an anime in the database.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the anime to update
      updatedAnime - the updated Anime object
      Returns:
      true if the anime was updated successfully, false otherwise

    • searchAnime

      public Anime searchAnime(String title)
      Searches for an anime by title.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the anime to search for
      Returns:
      the Anime object if found, null otherwise

    • searchAnimeByStudio

      public List<Anime> searchAnimeByStudio(String studio)
      Searches for anime by studio.
      Parameters:
      studio - the studio of the anime to search for
      Returns:
      a list of Anime objects if found, empty list otherwise

    • displayAllAnime

      public List<Anime> displayAllAnime()
      Displays all anime in the database.
      Returns:
      a list of all Anime objects in the database
